questions.questionText: Which of these cannot be used for a variable name in Java?
questions.explanation: Array arr contains 10 elements. n contains 6 thus in next line n is given value 3 printing arr[3]/2 i:e 3/2 = 1 because of int Value, by int values there is no rest. If this values would be float the result would be 1.5

questions.questionText: Which of the following is a type of polymorphism in Java Programming?
questions.explanation: enum is not used as a type in TypeScript

questions.questionText: Which of these class is a superclass of every class in Java?
questions.explanation: Object class is superclass of every class in Java.

questions.questionText: Which exception is thrown when java is out of memory?
questions.explanation: The Xms flag has no default value, and Xmx typically has a default value of 256MB. A common use for these flags is when you encounter a java.lang.OutOfMemoryError.

questions.questionText: Which of these keywords are used for the block to be examined for exceptions?
questions.explanation: try is used for the block that needs to checked for exception.
